title: SEL Schema
description: SEL files are Spacy Entity Lookup files for a particular docket's judge entities

Entity_Extraction_Method.description: The method used to extract and identify an entity at this location. A Spacy Judge NLP Model, or docket key values

docket_source.description: Source from the docket that this entity was pulled from.

judge_enum.description: If there are multiple entities in a lookup source, we enumerate them pythonically in the order they are listed; null for docket entries

party_enum.description: The enumerated party number (0-indexed) that the judge entity was tied to on a criminal case; null for civil and docket entries

pacer_id.description: If the judge in the header metadata was given an ID on the PACER HTML, we replilcate that here

docket_index.description: The docket entry index (0-start) that this entity is located at; null for case_header and case_parties

court.description: Abbreviation for the Federal District Court this case is docketed at

year.description: Approximation of the filing date year for the overall case

original_text.description: Original string of text found on the docket that our entity was extracted from, padded with preceding and trailing tokens

Extracted_Entity.description: Specific string of text that represents the entity this row of data references

Prefix_Categories.description: The categorization of the preceding text before the entity. The label corresponds to types of words appearing before the judge entity

Transferred_Flag.description: A boolean flag indicating if the judge entity was prefaced immediately prior with terminology related to case transferrals.

full_span_start.description: Span starting point for the Original Text with respect to the overall text at the particular docket_source-docket_index location

full_span_end.description: Span ending point for the Original Text with respect to the overall text at the particular docket_source-docket_index location

Entity_Span_Start.description: Span starting point for the Extracted Entity with respect to the overall text at the particular docket_source-docket_index location

Entity_Span_End.description: Span ending point for the Extracted Entity with respect to the overall text at the particular docket_source-docket_index location

Parent_Entity.description: The identified unique entity the Extracted Entity in the data row is referring to.

SJID.description: Unique SCALES Judge Identifier for the Paren Entity associated with this location
